shadow.name: FANTASY
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Decrease, expressing through fantasy

gift.name: ANTICIPATION
gift.description: The gift frequency of Decrease, expressing through anticipation

siddhi.name: EMANATION
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Decrease, expressing through emanation

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 41 shadow frequency. The fantasy you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural anticipation. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from fantasy to anticipation.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your root. Notice the sensation of fantasy.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 41 consciously for 7 days, the fantasy pattern will shift toward anticipation.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 41 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from fantasy toward anticipation
